question: When do classes start?
answer: The first day of classes is August 18, 2025.

question: How do I contact my academic advisor?
answer: You can email your advisor or schedule an appointment through the student portal at https://portal.ulm.edu

question: Can I change my major after the first semester?
answer: Yes, you can change your major by submitting a request through the Registrar's Office website at https://ulm.edu/registrar

question: Where can I find the course catalog?
answer: The course catalog is available online at https://catalog.ulm.edu

question: Is there a tutoring center on campus?
answer: Yes, the Learning Commons in the library offers free tutoring for many subjects. Visit https://ulm.edu/tutoring for more information.

question: Are pets allowed in the dorms?
answer: No, pets are not allowed in university housing. Check the housing policy at https://ulm.edu/housing/policies

question: What meal plans are available for students?
answer: ULM offers All-Access, 14-meal, and 10-meal plans with varying Flex Dollars. View all plans at https://ulm.edu/dining

question: What is your name?
answer: I'm Sujal's custom FAQ chatbot. You can learn more about me at https://github.com/Sujal-thapaa/Business

question: Who are you?
answer: I'm a helpful chatbot trained to answer questions about your university. Check out my source code at https://github.com/Sujal-thapaa/Business

question: Tell me something about yourself.
answer: I was built by Sujal Thapa to answer student questions quickly and accurately! Visit my GitHub page at https://github.com/Sujal-thapaa/Business
